mapper.insert:
select inquiry_seq.nextval from dual
insert into inquiry values(#{inquiryNo}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, to_date(sysdate, 'RR/MM/DD'), null, null, 1, 1, #{inquiryImage}, #{inquiry_user_no})
